newsitem.title: USA: EMI Group unit forms marketing company.
newsitem.headline: EMI Group unit forms marketing company.

text.p: EMI-Capitol Music Group North America said Friday it established a new company, EMI-Capitol Entertainment Properties, which will develop music-based properties and market the group's catalogue.
EMI said the strategic marketing company will be based in Los Angeles.

EMI said the stand-alone company will house its own artists and repertoir (A&R) department, product development, marketing, sales, finance and administrative, business affairs and international departments. EMI said the company's core business is managing the catalogues of the group's labels.
